long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension to remove those annoying cookie warnings from most websites!

EU regulations and concerns about online privacy made that (almost) every website is now including a cookie warning. And that's specially annoying if you use browse anonymously or automatically delete cookies after finishing.

This plugin removes or hides cookie warnings from most of the websites, saving you lots of clicks!

There are millions of websites on the internet. Some of them use "similar" tools to include those cookie warnings so they're easy to remove.

Some others are very specific or even weird, so they're more difficult to be detected. If you find a website where the extension doesn't work, just let us know ("report" option) and I'll fix it asap.
